name: Popup
description: A low-level floating UI container for building overlay components. Provides positioning, arrow rendering, and theme support as a building block for popovers, tooltips, and dropdowns.

do: Use as a base primitive for building custom overlay components
Use when Popover or Tooltip don't fit your specific use case
Sync width with trigger element when appropriate
dont: Don't use directly for common patterns â€” prefer Popover or Tooltip
Don't forget to handle focus management in custom implementations

variants.name: Sync Width
variants.description: Matches the width of trigger element

props.name: syncWithTrigger
props.description: Sync popup width with trigger width

accessibility.guideline: Ensure proper ARIA attributes on custom implementations
Manage focus when popup contains interactive content
